name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.install-claat: test -f claat || curl -Lo claat "https://github.com/googlecodelabs/tools/releases/latest/download/claat-$(uname -s)-amd64" && chmod +x claat
scripts.docs:build: pnpm install-claat && pnpm merge-md-files && ./claat export -o dist index.md
scripts.docs:serve: pnpm install-claat && nodemon --watch pages --exec 'pnpm merge-md-files && ./claat export -o dist index.md && http-server dist/index'
